full_summary:
### Request for Standing Offer - Evaluation Performance Measurement and Special Review Services for ISED

**Tender Reference:** cb-8457-85236530
**ITA Reference:** ISED208357PSIB
**Publication Date:** 24 August 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 10 October 2023

**Contract Information:**
The Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) audit and evaluation branch are seeking a Standing Offer Agreement for professional services to conduct evaluation, performance measurement and special studies/reviews. The task includes program evaluation under a five-year departmental evaluation plan, as well as the provision of advice and guidance on performance measurement strategies and performance information profiles.

**Service Requirements:**
 Specific services that ISED intends to acquire are:
* Complete program evaluations
* Performance measurement activities
* Special studies/reviews

**Evaluation and Selection:**
 Evaluation will be based on a combination of both technical merit and price. Interested suppliers are required to meet technical evaluation criteria set forth in the solicitation document.

**Eligibility:**
 This procurement is set aside for Indigenous businesses. Only suppliers that have identified as an Indigenous business are eligible to participate in this tender.

**Trade Agreements:**
 This procurement makes use of the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information:**
 If interested service providers would like to receive more information, or would like to receive the tender document, please contact:
 Davis Opie
 Email: davis.opie@ised-isde.gc.ca
 Phone: 613-324-9165

**Tender Documents:**
To get access to the tender document and other relevant information please visit [canadabuys.canada.ca](canadabuys.canada.ca) and search for the reference number ISED208357PSIB.
